contents.content: 第四部分 特殊规则
第三章 独立主格结构
第二节 真题分析
一、雅思阅读真题分析10例
Example 1

contents.title: 今天的铁路货运服务正面临着被边缘化，只有8%的市场份额，并且国际货物列车的平均速度仅仅是18千米每小时。
contents.answer: Today rail freight services are facing marginalisation, with just 8% of market share, and with international goods trains struggling along at an average speed of 18km/h.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，with just 8% of market share是“with+名词+介词短语”的独立主格结构，with international goods trains struggling along at an average speed of 18km/h.是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 2

contents.title: 此外，像伦敦国家画廊的主要收藏品都存放在众多的房间里，每个房间有几十件作品。
contents.answer: In addition, a major collection like that of London's National Gallery is housed in numerous rooms, each with dozens of works.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，each with dozens of works是“代词+介词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 3

contents.title: 建造于大约1700年，它（水井）有九层楼深，最底下的两层是在水下。
contents.answer: Constructed in around 1700, it is nine storeys deep, with the last two being underwater.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，with the last two being underwater是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 4

contents.title: 然而，最近它又经历了一次“复兴”，收藏品市场出现了对最初的酚醛树脂产品的需求，而博物馆、研究学会和一些爱好者又重新开始欣赏这种新材料的风格和原创性。
contents.answer: Recently, however, it has been experiencing something of a renaissance, with renewed demand for original Bakelite

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，with renewed demand for original Bakelite objects in the
collectors' marketplace是“with+名词+介词短语”的独立主格结构，museums, societies and dedicated individuals once again appreciating the style and originality of this innovative material是“名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 5

contents.title: 很多工作都需要数据测量，比如游泳选手入水时的角度，自行车运动员分秒间所产生的力。
contents.answer: A lot of their work comes down to measurement—everything from the exact angle of a swimmer's dive to the second-by-second power output of a cyclist.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，everything from…to…是“代词+介词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 6

contents.title: 煤炭对温室气体排放造成的总影响被认为大约占18%，其中大约有一半源自发电。
contents.answer: Coal's total contribution to greenhouse gas emissions is thought to be about 18 per cent, with about half of this coming from electricity generation.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，with about half of this coming from electricity generation是“with+
名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 7

contents.title: 而且有了几株松果菊，你将永远不会缺少药物。
contents.answer: And with a few Echinacea plants nearby, you'll never go short of a cure.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，with a few Echinacea plants nearby是“with+名词+副词”的独立主格结构。
Example 8

contents.title: 一些工作已经开始了，研究人员试图识别在自动超感官知觉全域测试中特别成功的人。
contents.answer: Some work has begun already, with researchers trying to identify people who are particularly successful in autoganzfeld trials.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的with researchers trying to identify people是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构；who引导的是定语从句，修饰people。
Example 9

contents.title: 由于磷几百磅一盎司，所以最初的火柴非常昂贵。
contents.answer: With phosphorus costing the equivalent of several hundred pounds per ounce, the first matches were expensive.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，With phosphorus costing the equivalent of several hundred pounds per ounce是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 10

contents.title: 第一个采用类似于今天的航空交通管制（ATC）的城市是纽约，随后不久，其他主要的大城市也都相继采用。
contents.answer: The first region to have something approximating today's ATC was New York City, with other major metropolitan areas following soon after.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，with other major metropolitan areas following soon after是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
二、雅思听力真题分析10例
Example 1

contents.title: 年龄大一些的孩子继续享受很多项目的学费优惠，从蹦床到瑜伽等。
contents.answer: Older children continue to benefit from a wide range of tuition, anything from trampolining to yoga.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，anything from trampolining to yoga是“代词+介词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 2

contents.title: 我相信，一个真正有意义的发展主要是增强竞争力，来自世界各地的公司都在试图出售类似的产品。
contents.answer: I'm sure a really significant development will be a major increase in competition, with companies from all round the world trying to sell similar products.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，sure后面是省略了引导词that的宾语从句，with companies from all round the world trying to sell similar products是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 3

contents.title: 独特的设计是基于地球村的概念，操场被分为六个区域，展示着世界的不同部分——每个部分都有典型的特征。
contents.answer: The unique design is based on the concept of the Global Village, with the playground being divided into six areas showing different parts of the world—each with a representative feature.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，with the playground being divided into six areas是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构，each with a representative feature是“代词+介词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 4

contents.title: 希望很快就能雇到第一位全职的生物学家——有海豚方面的专业知识——来监测种群。
contents.answer: It hopes soon to be able to employ its first full-time biologist—with dolphin expertise—to monitor populations.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，with dolphin expertise—to monitor populations是“with+名词+不定式短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 5

contents.title: 这给环境带来了巨大的变化，海平面上升并持续向内陆蔓延。
contents.answer: This brought about tremendous change in the environment, with the sea levels rising and creeping steadily inland.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，with the sea levels rising and creeping steadily inland是“with+
名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 6

contents.title: 而且，我们的营地是真的有利于儿童，记住，我们在晚上实行无噪声原则。
contents.answer: Our sites are truly child-friendly, and, with this in mind, we operate a no-noise rule in the evenings.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是由and连接的两个简单句组成的并列句，with this in mind是“with+代词+介词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 7

contents.title: 公共汽车从中心车站出发，每隔五六分钟一趟，从上午9点开始，最后一班车大约是下午7点。
contents.answer: Buses depart from Central Station every five to six minutes from about 9 a.m. with the last bus at around 7 p.m.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，with the last bus at around 7 p.m.是“with+名词+介词短语”的独立主格结构。
Example 8

contents.title: 基本上，我们安排10天的假期，从11月6日到16日，有8天实际上是步行，在塞米拉山艰苦跋涉。
contents.answer: Basically we are organising a ten-day holiday, from the sixth to the sixteenth of November, with eight days actual walking, trekking in the Semira Mountains.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，with eight days actual walking是“with+名词+现在分词”的独立主格结构。
Example 9

contents.title: 现在，考虑到你的选择，你在饮食上有什么特别要求，有什么我们应当知道的吗？
contents.answer: Now, with that in mind, do you have any special diet, anything we should know about

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的with that in mind是“with+代词+介词短语”的独立主格结构；we should know about是省略了引导词that的定语从句，修饰anything。
Example 10

contents.title: 正如你们所看到的，公园的西北部有一个湖，在湖的西边，路的尽头处有一个观鸟屋。
contents.answer: As you can see, there's a lake in the north west of the park, with a bird hide to the west of it, at the end of a path.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。As引导的是非限制性定语从句，主句中的with a bird hide to the west of it是“with+名词+介词短语”的独立主格结构，这里的hide是名词，意思是（观看野生动物的）隐蔽处。
三、雅思写作和口语中的独立主格结构
在雅思写作和口语中，独立主格也是很重要的加分结构。
下面我们就举例讲解独立主格结构的具体应用。

contents.title: 随着平均气温的不断升高，冰川开始融化，海平面比以前上升了。
contents.answer: ：With the average temperature continuously rising, glaciers begin to melt and sea level gets higher than before.

contents.content: 点评：这是由and连接的两个简单句组成的并列句，其中的With the average temperature continuously rising是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。该句常用于写作、口语的“环境类”话题中。

contents.title: 我相信，随着更广泛的技术可以被人们所利用，贫富差距将会不断缩小。
contents.answer: ：I believe, with the range of technology available to people, the gap between the rich and the poor will keep decreasing.

contents.content: 点评：这是一个主从复合句。believe后面是省略了引导词that的宾语从句，with the range of technology available to people是“with+名词+形容词短语”的独立主格结构。该句常用于写作、口语的“科技类和社会类”话题中。

contents.title: 违规驾驶的发生率居高不下，这引起了很多人的困扰和警觉。
contents.answer: ：With the incidence of driving offenses hovering at high levels, many have become disturbed and alarmed.

contents.content: 点评：这是一个简单句，With the incidence of driving offenses hovering at high levels是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。该句常用于写作、口语的“交通类”话题中。

contents.title: 近来，这个现象引起了公众的关注，人们持两种对立的观点。
contents.answer: ：Recently, this phenomenon has been brought to public attention, with people standing on both sides.

contents.content: 点评：这是一个简单句，with people standing on both sides是“with+名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。该句常用于写作中，引出双方的观点。

contents.title: 随着国家经济的增长和人民生活水平的提高，人们更加重视教育。
contents.answer: ：With the steady growth in the country's economy as well as the people's living standard, people attach more importance to education.

contents.content: 点评：这是一个简单句，With the steady growth in the country's economy as well as the people's living standard是“with+名词+介词短语”的独立主格结构。该句常用于写作、口语的“教育类”话题中。
